content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 * 
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@marlabsnycanalyticsdl.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
)WITH (
    location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)

 AS [result]
